QuestData.Title: The Bait
QuestData.Description: I'm sure of it... our ancient aquatic nemesis, Tu'u'gwar, "He Who Plays With Food", has returned. We must lay a trap for him, you and I.$B$BIf Tu'u'gwar has one weakness it's his stomach. There's one meat for certain that he'd never be able to pass up.$B$B"Two Huge Pincers", the mother of all crabs, Kili'ua, paces upon her island out in the waters to the southwest. You must pay her a visit and return with her meat.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain The Flesh of "Two Huge Pincers" and deliver it to Tua'kea at Moa'ki Harbor.
QuestData.CompletionText: You return with the succulent flesh of Kili'ua?
QuestData.RewardText: You were able to slay Kili'ua... perhaps you'll be able to do the same to Tu'u'gwar.$B$BPerhaps not.
